title: All Of My Ex’s Friends Are Fine
itunes:title: All Of My Ex’s Friends Are Fine
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 31 year old single female and I met a really good man on a dating app. We’re from the same city and we know a lot of the same people. We dated for 3 months and he revealed to me that he went to college with my ex-boyfriend and didn’t want to run me off by telling me that up front. I was cool with it but my ex-boyfriend wasn’t and when he found out, he called to tell me his friends were off-limits...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 31 year old single female and I met a really good man on a dating app. We’re from the same city and we know a lot of the same people. We dated for 3 months and he revealed to me that he went to college with my ex-boyfriend and didn’t want to run me off by telling me that up front. I was cool with it but my ex-boyfriend wasn’t and when he found out, he called to tell me his friends were off-limits...................
